remarks: "Ferison", one of the syllogisms of Aristotelian logic.  No ` ph ` is ` ps ` , and some ` ph ` is ` ch ` , therefore some ` ch ` is not ` ps ` .  (In Aristotelian notation, EIO-3:  MeP and MiS therefore SoP.) (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 28-Aug-2016.)  (Revised by David A. Wheeler, 2-Sep-2016.)
statement:
ferison.maj $e |- A. x ( ph -> -. ps ) $.
ferison.min $e |- E. x ( ph /\ ch ) $.
ferison $p |- E. x ( ch /\ -. ps ) $.
